```{r}
library(MASS)
data(birthwt)
str(birthwt)
birth.min <- glm(low ~ 1, family = binomial, data = birthwt)
summary(birth.min)
birth.max <- glm(low ~ age * lwt * factor(race) * smoke * ptl * ht * ui * ftv, family = binomial,
    data = birthwt)
summary(birth.max)
birth.main <- glm(low ~ age + lwt + factor(race) + smoke + ptl + ht + ui + ftv, family = binomial,
    data = birthwt)
summary(birth.main)
final.fit <- stepAIC(birth.main, scope = list(lower = birth.min, upper = birth.max),
    direction = "both")
anova(final.fit, test = "Chisq")
plot(final.fit)
```
